name: Scotophobia
description:
I vores spil handler det om at undgå mørket. Man skal interagere med omverdenen for at skabe en vej af lys, som man kan bruge til at komme videre. I nogen niveauer får du forskellige redskaber til at klare niveauet. Du samler disse redskaber via den mystiske postkasse.

Story:

The story surrounds our main Character Noa. Noa was wandering around, late, in the city. She passed the government building on the side walk, when she suddenly fell over a stone. The stone disappeared and the ground opened right before she it, leaving her falling into a black hole. She woke up and saw light.
